title: fix: update gateway commit for Gemini executable_code blocks + reasoning_effort fix
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Updated the text API gateway to better handle Gemini's native code execution blocks and reasoning effort settings.
gist.impact: Developers using Gemini models will see improved mapping for code execution results and more reliable thinking process visibility.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee mascot organizing glowing pixelated code blocks into a neat stack. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Represents code execution and logic. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
